name: issue_creation
description: Tracks the creation of issues, including the number of issues created, their creation dates, and the authors who created them.

dimensions.name: issue_number
dimensions.description: The unique identifier for each issue.

dimensions.name: created_at
dimensions.description: The timestamp when the issue was created.

dimensions.name: author_login
dimensions.description: The login of the author who created the issue.

dimensions.name: issue_status
dimensions.description: The current status of the issue, such as open or closed.

measures.name: total_issues
measures.description: The total number of issues created.

measures.name: issues_per_author
measures.description: The number of issues created by each author.

sample_questions: How many issues have been created?
What is the status of the issues?
What are the titles of the issues?
sql_to_underlying_datasource: SELECT number AS issue_number, created_at, author__login AS author_login, state AS issue_status, title AS issue_title FROM assistant_ui_issues_20241108111245.issues
